alert.note: Alert for Bleckley (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 27 at 11:49AM EDT until March 27 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LAURENS...SOUTHERN WILKINSON...SOUTHEASTERN TWIGGS AND NORTHEASTERN BLECKLEY COUNTIES... At 1149 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ripley to Jeffersonville to near Tarversville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Jeffersonville, Dudley, Danville, Montrose, Allentown, District Path, Harlow, Chappells Mill, Tuckers Crossroad and Nicklesville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
